spanGrp.span: I will tell you that when our people get married they do it according to the Greek traditions and the same with an engagement.
bizım bizım skažu da bizım halh ävläränsıra pa abičayu grečeskamu abičayu svadbi šeilär abručenialar nišannanmah äp pa grečeskoi abičai
That’s how we differ from them.
They get married very early in the age of thirteen, fourteen.
onnar tez ävlänerlär ondört onüč yašında
And the weddings they celebrate are much weaker than the way our people do it.
i dügün edirlär iš edirlär namnoga slabo čem bizım halh
Our people make a wedding politely, carefully and well mannered.
bizım halh eder kulturno vežliva i akuratno
Our people do everything by Greek traditions but they do by Turkish traditions.
bizımkınnär är erdä grečeski stilınän gidirlär onnar gidirlär onnar pa turetskoi stilınän turetskimi abičayami
Our people are doing everything by orthodox traditions and Greek traditions.
äm bizımkınnär bizımkınnär gider pa pravaslavnoi abıčai pa grečeskim etim kanonam
